p: Based on single effect experiments and literature reports, we designed three-factor, three-level experiments involving liquid material ratio (A), NaCl concentration (B), and distillation time (C). The experiments were carried out based on Boxâ€“Behnken design via Design-Expert 8.0.6 software (Stat-Ease Inc., Minneapolis, MN, USA), and the extraction yields of GOEO under different conditions are shown in Table 1.
